text: Brother Rat is a 1938 American comedy movie directed by William Keighley. It stars Priscilla Lane, Wayne Morris, Johnnie Davis, Jane Bryan, Eddie Albert, Jane Wyman, and Ronald Reagan. It was released on October 29, 1938. A sequel title Brother Rat and a Baby was released in 1940. Category:1938 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies set in Virginia Category:Movies directed by William Keighley
title: Brother Rat
